item.title: JavaEE: Using JSR 310 in your DTO's with JAX-RS
item.description: With Java 8 came JSR310, a new and improved date and time API for Java. This post will show you how you can use types from JSR310 directly in JAX-RS s by only leveraging the Java EE api.
